title: Australian Defence Scientific Service: 1969 report
creator_credit: John Carter, Malcolm Otton and Australian Commonwealth Film Unit
brief_description: The Australian Defence Scientific Service undertakes research in various fields. In the laboratories of the Weapons Research Establishment and other Commonwealth scientific areas, shows the research in thin film optics, and high-speed photography in the testing of explosives and munitions.
